title: It is advisable to be careful and avoid clicking on any suspicious or unknown links, as they may contain malware or phishing attempts. The Hyderabad cybercrime police have issued a warning to the public regarding potential threats of fabricated links claiming to have ‘live photos of Ayodhya’. They have urged citizens to exercise caution and vigilance when encountering such links, and to spread awareness among senior citizens, who are more vulnerable to such scams.
